Children.Title: Why
Children.Tooltip: Ask why this is even a thing.

Children.Title: Legal
Children.Tooltip: Ask about the legality of this business.

Children.Title: Refuse
Children.Tooltip: Say that you're not really interested.

ScriptAppear.Script:
-- If the player asks about legality, and then leaves, they're a snitch! So they get 'ate :)
return Storage.GetFlag("town_pit_desk_legal")

Children.Title: Accept
Children.Tooltip: Say that you want to participate.

Children.Title: ROAR!
Children.Tooltip: Give them a taste of your fighting spirit.

Children.Title: Taunt
Children.Tooltip: Give them a taste of your carnivorous intentions.

Children.Title: Remain silent
Children.Tooltip: Give them a taste of your calculated cunning.

ScriptAction.Script:
-- A little reprimand for sparing Carson, so it doesn't feel like it has zero consequence
Log("TOWN_PIT_O_TYE_CARSONSPARED")

Children.Title: Claim reward
Children.Tooltip: Ask for shares owed to you by the Club.

ScriptAppear.Script:
local hasClaim = Storage.GetNumber("TOWN_PIT_CASH_CLAIMED") < Storage.GetNumber("TOWN_PIT_CASH_ENTITLED")
local hasAnnoyed = Storage.GetFlag("TOWN_PIT_BUGGED_LOTS")

-- can view whenever you have an actual claim, or not yet received Rech's token
return hasClaim or not hasAnnoyed

ScriptAction.Script:
local entitled = Storage.GetNumber("TOWN_PIT_CASH_ENTITLED")
local claimed = Storage.GetNumber("TOWN_PIT_CASH_CLAIMED")

-- U1 Hotfix: Cap reward so we don't read out of bounds in the table
if entitled > #RewardGoldPit then
    if IsDevModeEnabled() then print("warning: entitled > #RewardGoldPit") end
    entitled = #RewardGoldPit
end

-- Apply tiered reward table
local totalReward = 0
while claimed < entitled do
    local reward = RewardGoldPit[claimed + 1]
    totalReward = totalReward + reward
    claimed = claimed + 1
end

-- Save edited number
Storage.SetNumber("TOWN_PIT_CASH_CLAIMED", claimed)
Storage.SetNumber("TOWN_PIT_CASH_BUGGED", 0)

-- Award calculated money
Player:ModifyMoney(totalReward)
Log("TOWN_PIT_DESK_REWARD")

Log("TOWN_PIT_DESK_REWARD_ANNOY")
Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_BUGGED_LOTS", true)
PreySense(Creature("CR_Town_Pit_RechFatal"), EPreySenseType.OralVore, EPreySenseType.DigestionFatal)
Player:GiveItem("I_PitRechToken")

ScriptAppear.Script:
-- Just one extra click is enough, because most players will be conditioned to not click the same button twice, let alone three times.
return Storage.GetNumber("TOWN_PIT_CASH_BUGGED") > 0

ScriptAction.Script:
SetLocation("The Club, Break Room")
Storage.SetFlag("savepoint", true)

if not Storage.GetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP4_WON") then
    Log("TOWN_PIT_SLEEPROOM_SLEEP")
end

FoodComa()
Log("TOWN_PIT_SLEEPROOM_SAVE", Color.LightGray)

SaveData.ShowSaveDialog()

if Storage.GetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP4_WON") then
    Log("TOWN_PIT_NEWCHAMP4")
else
    Log("TOWN_PIT_SLEEPROOM_WAKE")
end

if Storage.GetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP4_WON") then
    Log("TOWN_PIT_NEWCHAMP4")
else
    Log("TOWN_PIT_SLEEPROOM_WAKE")
end

Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP1_WON", true)
Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP1_FOUGHT", true)
Storage.SetNumber("TOWN_PIT_CASH_ENTITLED", 1) -- Reward tier 1
Log("TOWN_PIT_O_VULPES_VICTORY")

-- Game setup
SetLocation("The Club, Pit")
SetTimeHour(0)
SaveData.TakeCheckpoint()
-- Log messages
-- (No preysense because Carson is not a predator)
LogSplit()
Log("TOWN_PIT_O_CARSON2")

local state = Combat2()
state:AddParticipant(Player)
state:AddParticipant(Creature("CR_Town_Pit_Carson"))
state:OnCreatureKilled(function(killer, target)
    if not state:IsSwallowed(target) then
        -- Completed encounter without eating Carson, alternate dialogue
        Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP2_END_NOVORE", true)
    end
end)
state:OnPlayerKilled(function()
    -- Carson does not kill the player
    Player.Health = 1
    -- Manually write kill text because we just revived the player
    Log("TOWN_PIT_O_CARSON_KILL_GENERIC_POV")
    Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP2_LOST", true)
    state:End()
end)
state:Begin()

Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP2_LOST", true)
Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP2_FOUGHT", true)
LogSplit()
Log("TOWN_PIT_O_CARSON_DEFEAT")

Children.Title: Devour
Children.Tooltip: The best meal is a defenseless and squirming meal.

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("TOWN_PIT_O_CARSON_VICTORY_NV_EAT")

-- Show gulp text
local food = Creature("CR_Town_Pit_Carson")
Text.SetContext("predator", Player)
Text.SetContext("prey", food)
Sleep(3)
Log("TOWN_PIT_O_CARSON_VORE_WIN")

-- Start a digestion sequence (with Carson already swallowed)
local state = Combat2()
state:AddParticipant(Player)
state:AddParticipant(food)
state:SetVored(Player, food)
state:Begin()

Children.Title: Spare
Children.Tooltip: You hope that he might have done the same to you.

Children.Title: Insist
Children.Tooltip: You had a change of heart, perhaps.

ScriptAction.Script:
Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP2_WON", true)
Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP2_FOUGHT", true)
Storage.SetFlag("CARSON_DEAD", true)
Storage.ModifyNumber("TOWN_PIT_CASH_ENTITLED", 1)
Log("TOWN_PIT_O_CARSON_VICTORY")

-- Game setup
SetLocation("The Club, Pit")
SetTimeHour(0)
SaveData.TakeCheckpoint()
-- Log messages
LogSplit()
Log("TOWN_PIT_O_TYE2")
PreySense(Creature("CR_Town_Pit_Tye"), EPreySenseType.OralVore, EPreySenseType.DigestionFatal)

Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP3_WON", true)
Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP3_FOUGHT", true)
Storage.SetFlag("TYE_DEAD", true)
Storage.ModifyNumber("TOWN_PIT_CASH_ENTITLED", 1)
Log("TOWN_PIT_O_TYE_VICTORY")
Player:GiveItem("I_PitTyePendant")

-- Game setup
SetLocation("The Club, Pit")
SetTimeHour(0)
SaveData.TakeCheckpoint()
-- Log messages
LogSplit()
Log("TOWN_PIT_O_PHILLIP2")
PreySense(Creature("CR_Town_Pit_Phillip"), EPreySenseType.OralVore, EPreySenseType.DigestionFatal)

Children.Title: Begin
Children.Tooltip: Oh, you won't keep him waiting, alright...

ScriptAction.Script:
Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP4_WON", true)
Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_PIT_OPP4_FOUGHT", true)
Storage.SetFlag("PHILLIP_DEAD", true)
Storage.ModifyNumber("TOWN_PIT_CASH_ENTITLED", 1)
Log("TOWN_PIT_O_PHILLIP_VICTORY")
